page.title: 01General Information.
page.content: Our twelve square kilometres are situated towards the northeast of Essex, approximately halfway between the towns of Braintree and Witham. The area includes the small village of{White Notley}and parts of the smaller communities of{Faukbourne}and{ {Fairstead. The countryside throughout is fairly flat and the great majority of the land is given over to farming with scattered farm buildings. Only two roads of any size pass through the area, the larger of these (B1018) only just touching the northeast corner. Other than these two roads all others are little more than country lanes. There has been relatively little housing development in recent years.
